pressItems.title: His Yoke My Rest - Album Review
pressItems.excerpt: A beautiful album which has a great balance of simple worship, challenges and just the right touch in production. Chukwuemeka creates simple, deep, and spirit-filled music that invites listeners to find true rest in God.

pressItems.title: His Yoke My Rest - Personal Thoughts and Reaction
